entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
